scripts.deploy:sepolia-studio: yarn prepare:sepolia && graph deploy --studio brokester-sepolia -l v$npm_package_version
scripts.deploy:mainnet-studio: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --studio brokester -l v$npm_package_version
scripts.deploy:base-studio: yarn prepare:base && graph deploy --studio brokester-base -l v$npm_package_version
scripts.deploy:snapshot-all: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy:sepolia-studio && yarn deploy:mainnet-studio && yarn deploy:base-studio
